Others: UEFA has fined Albania for fans lighting flares and fireworks, throwing beer cups, and a fan storming the pitch during a match with Italy. Albania was also fined for displaying an Albanian map with its borders extending into neighbouring countries' territories.
Serbia was charged for displaying a nationalist banner during its game against England, featuring the territory of Kosovo above a slogan that said ‘No Surrender’.
Kosovar journalist Arlind Sadiku was banned from Euro 2024 media accreditation after making the nationalist double-headed eagle gesture to Serbian fans during the Serbia-England game.
